p: In the Americas, from October 25, 2015 to December 29, 2016, there were 177 614 confirmed cases of Zika virus infection and 2525 confirmed congenital syndromes associated with it. 9 In Colombia, there were 6363 confirmed cases of Zika virus infection in pregnant women since the beginning of the epidemic in 2015 through December 31, 2016. 10 Moreover, there were 318 cases of newborn microcephaly attributed to pregnancy‐related Zika virus infection during the epidemic phase of the virus through July 2016. 11
